text: Being a movie star, and this applies to all of them, means being looked at from every possible direction. You are never left at peace, you're just fair game.
author: Greta Garbo

text: We cannot be both the world's leading champion of peace and the world's leading supplier of the weapons of war.
author: Jimmy Carter

text: The hippies wanted peace and love. We wanted Ferraris, blondes and switchblades.
author: Alice Cooper

text: When we were at peace, Democrats wanted to raise taxes. Now there's a war, so Democrats want to raise taxes. When there was a surplus, Democrats wanted to raise taxes. Now that there is a mild recession, Democrats want to raise taxes.
author: Ann Coulter

text: Peace as a goal is an ideal which will not be contested by any government or nation, not even the most belligerent.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi
